content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed begins with The Mary Murdock Murder Case from Broadway Is My Beat. That story aired May 1, 1949.

(30:18) Our second story brings us Sherlock Holmes in, The Adventure Of The Three Garridebs. That episode was first heard May 9, 1949.

Download CaseClosed816

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to donate, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you.
